Text: Senator McConnell confirming more judges, as the nation is literally bleeding, with the votes of the same Senators who refused to convict Trump at his impeachment trial. https://t.co/WJ57ba32id

think about this, trump would rather declare martial law on millions of americans than to, RIGHTFULLY, arrest and charge 3 officers with murder. THIS is the country we live in. i will never forgive the people who put him in office.

We have now watched an armed attack, instigated by the president of the United States, on peaceful, law-abiding demonstrators exercising their Constitutional rights. All of Trump's actions and words have etched today as a grim moment in American history.

Trump would rather start a civil war than say that black people deserve to be alive. Johnson would rather look after his mate than protect you from a pandemic. Stop voting for people that do not care about you.

You may think it's only a small thing that the military used helicopters to intimidate American civilians in the nation's capital. It's not. A line was crossed tonight. There will be other lines. This is Trump conditioning them to cross those lines.

So, apparently Trump arranged for peaceful protesters outside the White House to be tear gassed. This was so he could walk, unhindered, to a church after his televised speech in which he threatened to quell protests with US military force. Those are both things that fascists do.

Trump fired tear gas and rubber bullets on peaceful protestors so he could get a photo opp in front a church that didn't want him there, holding a Bible from which he cannot name a single verse, all to prove he's not a coward hiding in his bunker again. A perfect encapsulation.

@w_terrence Unfortunately, Democrats were hoping for something like this to happen. They don't grieve for Floyd, they are happy that the man died so they can blame it on Trump and destroy the country.
